name: Loop Run - Popular Ball Game
description:
Loop Run Impossible is the most addictive popular ball race game which is gonna keep you hooked for hours. only 1% of poeple can beat this remember It is hareder than you think!

Your 3D looking ball will come out of black hole to enter into the level scene and will go back to the same black hole to exit from current scene and enter the new one.
You will have to collect coin to make the score, the color of central big disk will be changed every time. It is a ball running on loop with colorful design, dynamic music and unexpected obstacles.

🌟 Game Objects 🌟

🌟 Black Ball 🌟
Black ball is the main character of the game with a round collision shape, It will keep running on the loop untill you don't enter the black hole.

🌟 Red Spike 🌟%
It is the main obstacle of the game, which will appear on every scene at different places with surprises you will have to tap to jump over it to save the player.

🌟 Blue Coin 🌟
It is the main source of making score, cause this is the method you will gain score each time you pick a blue 3D coin. Each blue coin give score of 01.

🌟 Green Coin 🌟
It is the bonus in the game which will give you collective score of 10 at once. This score is added with the main one.

🌟 Red Ring 🌟
It is a kind of hurdle in the game, if you enter into it this will take you to the start of the scene, so whenever you see it just jump over it.
🌟 Cyan Ring 🌟
This is a great surprise for you which will make your rolling ball happy cause it will remove the upcoming obstacle and hurdle.

🌟 Game Modes 🌟
This game has 04 Modes

1. Easy: As the name denotes it is very easy for beginner to play.
2. Medium: This mode is for those who have started addictive with this fun game.
3. Hard: It is a little bit more addictive mode of game.
4. Impossible: This is the most impossible game mode which will make you crazy while playing.

🌟 Other feature of Game 🌟

- This is an endless game. - All free to play anywhere at any time. - A single tap hyper casual game which can be challenging as well.
- Make high score to challenge your friends and yourself.
- Suitable for all ages.

How to Play
Game play is very easy just single-tap to jump over the hurdles and obstacles and double-tap to jump twice where required.
Avoid red colored objects and love blue, green and cyan colors. Chose the mode which best suites you.
